() Differentiating the displacement function with respect to time twice (x) Differentiating the displacement function with respect to time once () Integrating the displacement function with respect to time once () Integrating the displacement function with respect to time twice
5. Scotch Yoke Mechanism is an inversion of ?
(x) Double Slider Crank Linkage () Four Bar Linkage () Slider Crank Linkage () None of these
